subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: The Islanders lost to the Devils, 3-0, in a preseason game at the Barclays Center, but they showed off the arena they will call home beginning in 2015-6.
snippet: The Islanders lost to the Devils, 3-0, in a preseason game at the Barclays Center, but they showed off the arena they will call home beginning in 2015-6.
